document_data.name: Delimbiyr Bloke
document_data.mainbody: The '''Delimbiyr Bloke''', properly called the '''Face of Gorm''' was a [[magical item]] and holy relic dedicated to the [[dwarven deity]], [[Gorm Gulthyn]].<ref name=SotSC-p6>
document_data.Description: It was a brick-sized block of shining [[quartz|quartzite]] carved with an abstract bearded face on it.<ref name=SotSC-p6/>
document_data.Powers: The relic was capable of conjuring forth ''[[daylight]]'' as well as [[summon]]ing the spirits of ancient [[dwarf]] warriors to fight alongside a goodly wielder of the Bloke. These spirits would however attack an evil wielder.<ref name=SotSC-p54/>
